name: Glitch Hunters
description:
Your name's Mux, and you're a frequent player of Coarsesoft Studios' new neonpunk MMO, Project Otherworld. Even though it's a super buggy game, your passion for finding game glitches is so great that you've helped form an unofficial group called the Glitch Hunters.

Work together with your friends Alu and Cheesegrater to find glitches in the game to report to the devs and share with the community. Grab your scooter and break that level!

Controls:

WASDMoveMouseCameraSpaceJumpLeft click
Spin trick
Right click
Speed boost
ETalk to people
RRespawn
Q/EscapePause/Open glitch list

Made for the Billy's Basement Game Jam. The theme was "Glitched."

Developed by:

  • Diane Sparks - Programming, UI, sound design
  • Brian Dizon - Programming, level design, level art
  • Riley Park - Writing, particle effects
  • Sheridan Steele - Character art and design

Music by Eric Matyas - www.soundimage.org
